com.espertech.esper.jmx.mbean

Interface ListenerMBean


  • public interface ListenerMBean
    Interface for functions over a statement's listener held in an Esper engine instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStatement(javax.management.ObjectName statement)
      Add a statement to the listener.
      java.lang.String getClassName()
      Returns the fully-qualified class name of the listener class.
      javax.management.ObjectName[] getStatements()
      Returns all object named of statements that the listener is registered for
      java.lang.String getTooltip()
      Returns the result of the toString() method on the listener class.
      boolean isStatementAwareListener()
      Returns true if the listener is a statement aware listener
      void removeStatement(javax.management.ObjectName statement)
      Removes a statement from the listener.

    • Method Detail

      • getClassName

        java.lang.String getClassName()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the fully-qualified class name of the listener class.
        Returns:
        class name of listener
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • getTooltip

        java.lang.String getTooltip()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the result of the toString() method on the listener class.
        Returns:
        return of listener.toString()
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • isStatementAwareListener

        boolean isStatementAwareListener()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Returns true if the listener is a statement aware listener
        Returns:
        indicator if statement aware
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • getStatements

        javax.management.ObjectName[] getStatements()
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Returns all object named of statements that the listener is registered for
        Returns:
        statement object names
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • addStatement

        void addStatement(javax.management.ObjectName statement)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Add a statement to the listener. Does not actually subscribe the listener to an EPStatement.
        Parameters:
        statement - to add to listener
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • removeStatement

        void removeStatement(javax.management.ObjectName statement)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Removes a statement from the listener. Does not actually unsubscribe the listener to an EPStatement.
        Parameters:
        statement - to remove from listener
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access
